title: Nalellam Lyrics Aadama Jaichomada Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Nalellam
Singer(s): Shakthisree Gopalan
Lyricist: GKB
Music: Sean Roldan

Nalellam seevi
naan singarichu ninirundhaen
enkolam nee kalaikka thaan.

Machaan vandhudiya
mayakkam thandhiduyaa
muththathil nee kulikka vaaa

Verum soththil suvai yedhaiyyaa
unakku venjalu maanavaarenya.
Un kannu enna moikkum
enna urasithaan ponga vaikkum.

Nalellam seevi
naan singarichu ninirundhaen
enkolam nee kalaikka thaan.

Panju pola vandhu ninna
paththikkuven naanumnaa
thoda thoda thoda theepori parakkum

vela mudnju neeyum vandhadha
verthiduven naanumnaa
mudinjaalum kadhaya thodarum
haiyyo unna nenachuthaan

potten kanakku onnu naan.
pulli vachaa kolamthaan
pootti vaippen unna naan.

Machaan vandhudiya
mayakkam thandhiduyaa
muththathil nee kulikka vaaa

Verum soththil suvai yedhaiyyaa
unakku venjalu maanavaarenya.
Un kannu enna moikkum
enna urasithaan ponga vaikkum.
